2.title: N/A
2.screenText:
Your Health and Well-Being
This survey asks for your views about your health. This information will help keep track of how you feel and how well you are able to do your usual activities. Thank you for completing this survey!
For each of the following questions, please select the one response that best describes your answer.
2.additionalDetails: “Your Health and Well- Being” to be center aligned. Follow screen text left aligned.

3.shortQuestionText: SF364-In General You Say Your Health Is
3.title: N/A
3.screenText: In general, would you say your health is:
3.additionalDetails: Screen text and response values to be center aligned.

4.shortQuestionText: SF364-Comp Week Ago Rate Gen Health Now
4.title: N/A
4.screenText: <u>Compared to one <u/><u>week<u/><u> ago<u/>, how would you rate your health in general <u>now<u/>?
answerValues: Much better now than one week ago
Somewhat better now than one week ago
About the same as one week ago
Somewhat worse now than one week ago
Much worse now than one week ago
4.additionalDetails: Screen text and response values to be center aligned.
